page.title: 10LEISURE TIME IN FRANKLEY
page.content: Many families in the area own or rent a television,video recorder or stereo system which are used in evenings and weekends as the main entertainment for the family.Video films rented very cheaply are a great favourite.Outside the home adults favour Bingo and the pub.Children prefer playing outside the home or in the small wooded or countryside areas.Their favourite toys seem to be roller-boots and B.M.X. bikes.Some are interested in the new craze of break dancing or in traditional sports such as footbal There are occasional family outings to the cinema,or to eating places such as Macdonald's.Some go to Midland football matches or to increasingly popular sports such as ice hockey and basketball - both sports prominent within the City of Birmingham.
